entry.title: Monday night: Clearing. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High 7.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 7. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers changing to 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Snow level 2000 metres lowering to valley bottom in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 17 April 2023
